trans-unit.source: Specifies how numbers in text are displayed in different cultures.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvordan tall i teksten vises i ulike kulturer.

trans-unit.source: Most cultures use the decimal system to represent numbers, but many cultures use different digit shapes.
trans-unit.target: De fleste kulturer Bruk decimal systemet til å representere tall, men mange kulturer bruke annen sifferformer.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows several numbering systems used by different cultures.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser flere nummerering systemer som brukes av ulike kulturer.

trans-unit.source: ![Table of number substitution glyphs](~/add/media/numbersubstitution01.png "Table of number substitution glyphs") Example of the appearance of digits in different cultures It is not sufficient to provide alternate Unicode code points for each set of digit shapes, because, unlike letters, digits are used in calculations.
trans-unit.target: ![Tabellen for tallet erstatning symboler](~/add/media/numbersubstitution01.png "tabell med tallet erstatning symboler") eksempel på hvordan sifre i ulike kulturer ikke er tilstrekkelige til å angi alternativ Unicode-kodepunkt for hvert sett med sifferformer fordi i motsetning til bokstaver, sifre som brukes i beregninger.

trans-unit.source: Every application, every operating system, and every run-time library contains code dedicated to converting an internal binary format numeric value to a string of characters, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Alle programmer, hver operativsystem og kjøretid biblioteker inneholder kode dedikert til konvertering av en intern binærformat numerisk verdi til en tegnstreng og omvendt.

trans-unit.source: These conversion routines are coded to use Unicode digits "0030" through "0039".
trans-unit.target: Disse konvertering for kodet Hvis du vil bruke Unicode sifre "0030" til "0039".

trans-unit.source: The NumberSubstitution class provides functionality that allows different cultures to substitute the appropriate digit shapes at rendering time.
trans-unit.target: Klassen NumberSubstitution inneholder funksjoner som gjør at ulike kulturer erstatte riktig siffer formene på tidspunkt for gjengivelse.

trans-unit.source: This functionality is similar to the one used for providing font substitution and language dependent font rendering.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonaliteten er lik den brukte for å tilby skrifterstatning og språket avhengige skrift gjengivelse.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Many cultures are discarding their traditional digits shapes and adopting Western digits shapes, therefore the number substitution functionality recognizes the distinction for each culture between traditional digit shapes and national standard digit shapes.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Mange kulturer er forkaste formen tradisjonell sifre og bruk vestlige sifre former, derfor tallet erstatning funksjonaliteten gjenkjenner forskjellen for hver kulturen mellom tradisjonell sifferformer og national standard sifferformer.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage This type is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] as an object element.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk denne typen ikke brukes vanligvis i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] som et objekt-element.

trans-unit.source: However, the type exposes several attached properties that can be set on other object elements that have text content.
trans-unit.target: Typen viser imidlertid flere vedlagte egenskaper som kan angis for andre elementer for objektet som har tekstinnhold.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"></xref> class with explicit property values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"> </xref> klasse eksplisitt egenskapsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the source of the culture value that is used to determine number substitution.
trans-unit.target: Angir kilden for Kulturverdien som brukes til å fastsette tallet erstatning.

trans-unit.source: Identifies which culture to use when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer hvilke kultur Hvis du vil bruke når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource*>er satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the substitution method that is used to determine number substitution.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer erstatning metoden som brukes til å fastsette tallet erstatning.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value which identifies which culture to use when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som identifiserer hvilke kultur Hvis du vil bruke når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource*>er satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource%2A> property is `null`, which is interpreted as the "en-us" (United States English) culture.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource%2A>egenskapen `null`, som tolkes som den "en-oss" (USA-engelsk) kultur.</xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource>, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource%2A>ikke er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource>, ignoreres denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource> </xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This reference page represents two identically named but not entirely equivalent usages for the CultureOverride property: - You can set this property in code on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution> instance, as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property.
trans-unit.target: Denne referansesiden representerer to identiske navn, men ikke helt tilsvarende anvendelse egenskapen CultureOverride:-du kan angi denne egenskapen i kode på en <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution>forekomsten som en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution>

trans-unit.source: In this usage, the property is not backed by a dependency property identifier, it is backed by a private field and does not act as a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: I denne bruken egenskapen støttes ikke av en avhengighet egenskapsidentifikator, leveres med et private-felt, og det ikke fungerer som en avhengighetsegenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - You can set this property as an attached property usage in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: -Du kan angi denne egenskapen som det vedlagte egenskapen forbruk i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The attached property usage is the reason why this property has a Dependency Property Information section, because the attached property is backed by a dependency property identifier.
trans-unit.target: Bruksområdet vedlagte egenskapen er grunnen til hvorfor denne egenskapen har en avhengighet egenskapsinformasjon del fordi den tilknyttede egenskapen støttes av en egenskapsidentifikator avhengighet.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the usage is `<`*object* **NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride**`="`*value*`".../>`, where *object* is an object element where the specified number substitution logic applies, and *value* is one of the string-format values as explained in XAML Values.
trans-unit.target: I [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], bruken er `<` *objektet* **NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride**`="`*verdien*`".../>`, der *objektet* er et objekt-element der den angitte tallet erstatning logikken bruker, og *verdien* er én av strengformat verdier som beskrevet i XAML verdier.

trans-unit.source: In code, the attached property usage is supported by <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.GetCultureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.SetCultureOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I koden, og støttes den tilknyttede egenskapen bruken <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.GetCultureOverride%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.SetCultureOverride%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.SetCultureOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.GetCultureOverride%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *CultureInfo* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *CultureInfo* streng representasjon av en verdi.

trans-unit.source: For example, the string, "en-us", represents the United States English culture setting.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel strengen "en-us", representerer innstillingen USA-engelsk kultur.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> value that represents the culture that is used as an override.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>verdi som angir kulturen som brukes som en overstyring.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value which identifies the source of the culture value that is used to determine number substitution.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir kilde for Kulturverdien brukes til å fastsette tallet erstatning.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om det angitte objektet er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution> objects are equal if the following properties are equal: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.Substitution%2A>
trans-unit.target: To <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution>objekter er like Hvis er lik følgende egenskaper:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.Substitution%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.Substitution%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>skal sammenlignes med gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if o is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis o er lik gjeldende objekt; ellers .

trans-unit.source: If o is not a object, is returned.
trans-unit.target: If o is not a object, is returned.

trans-unit.target: Returnerer verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride*>fra det angitte elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution.CultureOverride*>

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>verdi som angir kulturen som brukes som en overstyring.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.target: En tallverdi av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberCultureSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som en hash-funksjonen for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: It is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: Det passer for bruk i nummer algoritmer og data strukturer som en hash-tabell.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>verdi som Representer hash-koden for det gjeldende objektet.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som identifiserer erstatning metoden som brukes til å fastsette tallet erstatning.
